definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Can I have a badminton court at three, please?
sentences.chinese: 我想在三点要一个羽毛球场，好吗？

sentences.english: The former badminton stadium, which was built as a temporary facility, has been converted into a popular theater.
sentences.chinese: 之前的羽毛球场已经被临时改建为一座剧院。

sentences.english: All users must wear proper sportswear and non-marking sport shoes in the Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 羽毛球场使用者必须穿著鞋底不脱色之运动鞋。

sentences.english: Badminton courts and swimming pool are deep in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 在园林深处设有网球场和羽毛球场及游泳池。

sentences.english: The gym has six badminton courts.
sentences.chinese: 那体育馆有六个羽毛球场。

definition: sandpit (for children's play or for long jump etc)/sandbox
table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
